name: DarkLight (Ricardo Gonçalves (DarkRikax))
description:
From one day to another, the world started to become "quiet", strange things started to appear… Dark Creatures!

Dark Creatures started to spawn everywhere out of nowhere!

You (the player) are guided to a drone named DaV3.0, but he likes Dave instead, that he will help you fix this world, or you will help him instead.

This game can only be played only with Mouse and Keyboard, and is Windows OS only.
